overview: A seemingly normal guy. A masked “freak” trapped in a crawl space. Two people stuck together who have a stronger connection than what is truly realized. The two must help each other to overcome their issues. The “freak” just wants to be free to explore, the normal guy just wants to get over a past lover. Will they be able to face their problems and conquer them together? Or will their internal issues and conflicting views destroy one another?
tagline: Don't Mask Who You Truly Are.
title: The "!" Mixtape
